array.string: launchctl setenv PATH $PATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS launchctl setenv PYTHONPATH $PYTHONPATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS launchctl setenv PYTHONPATH $PYTHONPATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS/python/lib/python2.7/site-packages launchctl setenv MAYA_SHELF_PATH $MAYA_SHELF_PATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS/maya_shelf launchctl setenv XBMLANGPATH $XBMLANGPATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS/conductor/resources launchctl setenv NUKE_PATH $NUKE_PATH:/Applications/Conductor.app/Content/MacOS/nuke_menu launchctl setenv CONDUCTOR_CONFIG ~/Library/Application Support/Conductor/config.yml
